value.description: The macro stubber is a pistol-platform auto weapon with an incredible high rate of fire, hurling a thunderous cloud of solid slugs at the target.\n\nThe Kronos pattern macro stubber is used exclusively by the Tech Priests of the Adeptus Mechanicus, though similar patterns are used by Skitarii officers and other troops aligned with the Mechanicum.

The combat shotgun is a weapon of ancient Imperial design. It is an automatic projectile weapon with a low rate of fire, firing solid-slug ballistic rounds similar to a heavy stubber. Cheap, rugged and reliable, it can be found throughout the Imperium.\n\nThe Vanaheim pattern shotgun is created by the Mechanicum for their Skitarii warriors, who use it as a close combat weapon. Similar weapons are provided for use by the Vostroyan Guard regiments who are loyal to Mars.

The stubcarbine is a compact, solid projectile weapon used exclusively by the Skitarii legions of the Mechanicum, especially the Sicarian Infiltrators. Despite its compact size, the stubcarbine deals damage similar to that of a heavy stubber.

The galvanic rifle, modelled after the hunting flintlocks of Mars' distant colonial past, is a precision tool in the hands of a Skitarii Ranger. Its bodywork is that of an antique, with a polished wooden stock and curlicues that echo the sandy seas of Mars' desert. Yet the galvanic Servitor-bullets inside are incredibly advanced. When such a bullet strikes home, it causes all the potential energy of the target to burn out in a killing blast of electric force.

The transuranic arquebus is a long-barrelled infantry weapon which epitomises the precision and inhuman efficiency that typify the cyborg Skitarii legions of the Mechanicum. Firing a shell of depleted transuranium, a transuranic arquebus can puncture a tank from one side to the other, the resultant pressure wave also pulping any biological creatures that may be sheltering inside.

ThingDef.label: heavy stubber (Vostroyan pattern)
ThingDef.description: Heavy stubber is the name given to a range of heavy-barrelled auto weapons used for sustained fire. Like autoguns they are easily manufactured and maintainedm and are commonly used by forces across the Imperium. A mainstay support weapon backwater planets that cannot maintain laser weapons in working order due to technological or resource limitations, and also popular with outlaws and hive gangers, the heavy stubber is ideal for fighting off large numbers of enemies or even lightly armoured vehicles. Its high rate of fire makes up for its modest strength and armour-piercing abilities.\n\nThe Vostroyan pattern heavy stubber is produced locally on the Mechanicum-aligned industrial world of Vostroya for use by the heavy weapons teams in their Guard regiments.

ThingDef.label: autocannon (Cognis pattern)
ThingDef.description: An Autocannon is an automatic, self-loading heavy ballistic weapon that fires a high velocity hail of solid shells, and is used by the military forces of the Imperium of Man. It is an ancient weapon, but has nevertheless remained a widely-used piece of wargear throughout the Imperium's history. These rapid-firing weapons can lay down a burst of fire to cover advancing troops, or strafe enemy-held positions. Autocannons are considered ideally suited for attacking enemy vehicles and fortifications from long range.
